scripts.split: git subtree split --prefix=$npm_package_src --branch=upm && git checkout upm

plugins.verifyConditionsCmd: git subtree split --rejoin --prefix=$SRC -b upm && git checkout upm
plugins.prepareCmd:
git add CHANGELOG.md package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): ${nextRelease.version}

${nextRelease.notes}'
plugins.successCmd: git subtree merge prefix=Assets/RotateMe upm -m 'Merge into develop'
